shri lankawen thawath korona wairas aasadithayan 889k handunagena thibenawa.ee anuwa ada dinaye meratin handunagath aasadithayan sankhyawa 2271k.ee anuwa meratin me dakwa korona aasadithayan 498,694k handunagena athi athara in 57398k rohalgathawa ho waidya adhikshanaya yatathe niweswala prathikara labamin pasuwanawa.suwaya laba niwes wetha pitathwa gos athi sankhyawa 428,590k.meratin korona marana 11817k da warthawi thibenawa.
